channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 05:35 Air alert in Sumy region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 05:35 Air alert in Sumy region. Follow further messages. #Sumy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 05:25 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyanskyi district- Kharkivskyi district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 🟡 05:25 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyanskyi district- Kharkivskyi district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community#Харкивська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
